mapper.select: select * from articleinfo where id=#{id} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update articleinfo set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatetime=#{updatetime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,u.username from articleinfo a left join userinfo u on u.id=a.uid where a.id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from articleinfo where id=#{id} and uid=#{uid}
